title: The Legend Of Heroes Trails In The Sky (Update 1 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for "The legend of heroes: Trails in the sky. Im not sure what the exact patch notes are because gog hasn't listed it on their forum page but it fixes a number of miscellaneous bugs and crashes. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.



--------------------


Also I added the Japanese voice acting patch into the torrent. The jpn voice patch just changes the battle voices from English to JPN. Thxs to IcemanSR for letting me know about the patch.

To install the jpn patch, just extract the files to the main game directory
